decision_conditions: Roof not to be used as balcony
description: Variation of Condition 1 (Approved Plans), Condition 3 (Approved Materials), Condition 4 (Approved Levels), Condition 6 (Details of Means of Enclosure), Condition 7 (Details of Rear Flat Roof), Condition 11 (Details of Cycle Parking), Condition 13 (Details of enclosures and screened facilities for refuse / recycling) and Condition 18 (Details of pedestrian access ramp) of planning permission reference 23/0721/FUL dated 19.04.2023 for 'Erection of a two-storey detached dwelling house with rooms in the roofspace and basement level. Associated landscaping, refuse and recycling, cycle store. Provision of car parking space'. Variation to include the proposed minor alterations including a new dual access vehicle crossover, altering basement staircase orientation,a reduction in the width of the rear elevation glazing, changes to fenestration, an increase in the width of the rear dormer windows, the introduction of a green roof and solar panels, the removal of the proposed side dormer window, the relocation of the proposed pedestrian ramp, a rear brise Soleil canopy, a the change in materials from brickwork to white render, and from red clay roof tiles to red/brown roof tiles, 2no. new side elevation facing rooflights, new front elevation boundary wall, new refuse/cycle storage and new external amenity space.
